channel.title: [PI] Making custom items other than weapon slot
channel.description: Well, i thought was pretty sure you had to add the item ID into the array int in item.java to make the item change from auto weapon to either body, cape, etc. But I was wrong. Anyone know how to fix this?

Darn. If you don’t know, no one knows = (
